div.p: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other observation is missing.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other observation is missing.

display.value: The source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or the question was left unanswered.

definition.value: The source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or the question was left unanswered.

display.value: The question or data element is not applicable, or based on other answers, no answer to this question is required.

definition.value: The question or data element is not applicable, or based on other answers, no answer to this question is required.

display.value: The reason the information is not present is not known.

definition.value: The reason the information is not present is not known.

display.value: The request or order to collect this information was cancelled.

definition.value: The request or order to collect this information was cancelled.

display.value: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

definition.value: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

display.value: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.

definition.value: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
